The example graph contains 6 articles and 10 links:

 5: Violet    6: Violet
 (flower) -->  (color)
       ^         |
        \        |
      4: Rose    |
          |      |
          v      |
      1: Red     |
       ^    ^    |
      /      \   |
     v        v  v
2: Green <--> Blue (3)

The graph and metadata can be generated with something like:

% build/apps/indexer testdata/example.xml
